text: Amazon has a must-see sale on the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 and Z Flip 5 Samsung makes several of the most popular and powerful Android phones on the planet. Right now -- but only for a limited time -- Amazon has cut the … [Sean Kernan](/@seanjkernan) flipped this story into [News & More](/@seanjkernan/news-more-qoeqaj8kz)•2h Related storyboards More stories from [Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5](/topic/samsunggalaxyzfold5) - Storyboard The Galaxy Watch FE is no more... but it might re-appear by another nameCurated byTechRadar [The rumors around Samsung’s 2024 line of smartwatches are far from new, and we’ve been onto them since speculation of the Galaxy Watch 7 and a rebooted Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 arose earlier this year. While the latter rumor was initially tipped to be launched as the ‘Galaxy Watch FE’, a leaker has revealed that the rebooted watch won’t be adopting this name after all.](/@techradar/the-galaxy-watch-fe-is-no-more...-but-it-might-re-appear-by-another-name-9o2o5m70c39j4evb) [Foldable phone deals: Samsung, Motorola, Google, and more, from $500](/topic/samsunggalaxyzfold5/foldable-phone-deals-samsung-motorola-google-and-more-from-500/a-KoX0Mw0NQSaLMtuoEHnXaA%3Aa%3A3195397-27f7ac99b7%2Fmiamiherald.com) Now’s a great time to buy a foldable phone because of the discounts that are available through phone deals from Motorola and Best Buy. If you’ve been … [Want a foldable phone?
